name: Pizza
description: A classic Italian dish consisting of dough, tomato sauce, cheese, and a variety of toppings, often including pepperoni.

name: Sushi
description: A Japanese dish consisting of bite-sized pieces of raw fish and vegetables, served on top of seasoned rice and wrapped in seaweed.

name: Taco
description: A Mexican dish consisting of a tortilla filled with a variety of ingredients, such as seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Pad Thai
description: A Thai dish consisting of stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, peanuts, bean sprouts, and scallions, seasoned with a tangy sauce.

name: Burger
description: An American classic consisting of a grilled beef patty served on a bun with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles.

name: Croissant
description: A French pastry made with layers of buttery, flaky dough, typically served as a breakfast item or snack.
